General.Name: Litemax Electronics
General.Description: Litemax Electronics Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LCD panels and monitors in the United States, Asia, and Europe. It offers industrial display products, including Spanpixel resizing LCDs, Durapixel sunlight readable LCDs, Squarepixel square LCDs, UbiPixel industrial LCDs, Navpixel marine displays, and custom LCD displays; boards and modules; embedded box, industrial panel, modular panel, rugged panel, and transportation panel PCs; and monitors. The company also provides AIoT solutions, such as artificial intelligence edge computing, and smart display and kiosk modules; and accessories comprising AD, power, daisy chain, and intelligent thermal control boards. It serves the transportation, industrial, marine, digital signage, gaming, heavy duty, POS/kiosk, and healthcare industries. Litemax Electronics Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 137, Baoqiao Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23145
